requirements.minimum_road_width: Road width must accommodate load width + 2 ft clearance on each side
requirements.pilot_car_escort: Required for loads >14' wide; 2 escorts for >16' wide
requirements.trip_permits: Available online through IDOT system; 72-hour and 144-hour permits available
requirements.running_hours: Daylight hours (1/2 hour before sunrise to 1/2 hour after sunset) for OS loads; 24/7 for OW only with legal dimensions
requirements.holiday_restrictions: No travel on major holidays for oversize loads
requirements.banner_regulations: "OVERSIZE LOAD" banner required; yellow background with black letters
requirements.flag_regulations: Red or fluorescent orange flags 18" square minimum at all extremities
requirements.warning_light_regulations: Amber warning lights required on escort vehicles
requirements.permit_dimensions: Standard max: 200'L x 14.5'W x 15'H; Superload permits available
requirements.commodity_specific: Agricultural equipment may have exemptions; special permits for specific commodities
requirements.route_requirements: Route approval required for superloads; bridge analysis may be required

requirements.minimum_road_width: Road width must be at least 2 ft wider than load on each side
requirements.pilot_car_escort: 1 escort for loads >12' wide; 2 escorts for >14' wide
requirements.trip_permits: Available online; up to 10 days validity
requirements.fuel_permits: IFTA credentials required for interstate carriers
requirements.running_hours: Continuous travel for loads up to 10'W x 13.5'H x 110'L; restricted hours for larger loads (8:30am-3:30pm Mon-Fri)
requirements.holiday_restrictions: No travel on major holidays for oversize loads
requirements.banner_regulations: "OVERSIZE LOAD" sign required; yellow background with black letters, visible 500'
requirements.flag_regulations: Red or orange fluorescent flags 18" square at extremities
requirements.warning_light_regulations: Flashing or strobe amber light must be mounted on towing unit
requirements.permit_dimensions: Standard max: 110'L x 16'W x 15'H; Superloads require special approval
requirements.commodity_specific: Agricultural equipment has some exemptions; containerized cargo permits available
requirements.route_requirements: Route approval required for loads >10'W or >120,000 lbs; bridge analysis may be required

requirements.minimum_road_width: Road width must accommodate load + 2 ft clearance each side
requirements.pilot_car_escort: 1 escort for >12' wide; 2 escorts for >14' wide OR >150' long
requirements.running_hours: 1/2 hour before sunrise to 1/2 hour after sunset for OS loads
requirements.holiday_restrictions: No movement on major holidays for oversize loads
requirements.banner_regulations: "OVERSIZE LOAD" banner required; yellow background with black letters
requirements.flag_regulations: Red or orange flags at extremities for OS loads
requirements.warning_light_regulations: Amber warning lights required for wide loads and escorts
requirements.permit_dimensions: Standard max: 100'L x 16'W x 15'H; Superload >16'W or >100'L or >160,000 lbs
requirements.commodity_specific: Agricultural equipment may have seasonal exemptions
requirements.route_requirements: Route approval required for superloads; bridge analysis required for heavy loads

requirements.minimum_road_width: Road width must accommodate load + clearance
requirements.pilot_car_escort: 1 escort for >12' wide; 2 escorts for >14' wide; additional for superloads
requirements.trip_permits: Available online only through NDOT Carson City; 10 business days advance notice for superloads
requirements.running_hours: Daylight hours for OS loads; some routes have specific time restrictions
requirements.holiday_restrictions: No travel on major holidays for oversize loads
requirements.banner_regulations: "OVERSIZE LOAD" sign required; reflective material, yellow with black letters
requirements.flag_regulations: Red or orange flags 18" square at extremities
requirements.warning_light_regulations: Amber flashing lights required on escort vehicles and wide loads
requirements.permit_dimensions: Standard max: 150'L x 17'W x 18'H; Superload >17'W (2-3 lane) or >19'W (4+ lane) or >18'H or >200'L
requirements.commodity_specific: Mining equipment common; special permits for gaming equipment
requirements.route_requirements: All superloads require route survey; advance coordination with utilities and law enforcement

permit_costs.notes: $10 for OS or OW, $20 for both

requirements.minimum_road_width: Road width must accommodate load width + safe clearance
requirements.height_pole: Required for loads over 13.5'; utility notification required for loads >14'
requirements.pilot_car_escort: 1 escort for loads >14' wide; 2 escorts for >16' wide
requirements.trip_permits: Available online at nj.gotpermits.com; non-divisible load certification required
requirements.fuel_permits: IFTA credentials required for interstate carriers
requirements.running_hours: Daylight hours Monday-Friday and until noon Saturday; no travel Saturday afternoon, Sunday, or holidays for OS loads
requirements.holiday_restrictions: No travel on major holidays or weekends for oversize loads; OW-only loads not restricted
requirements.banner_regulations: "OVERSIZE LOAD" banner required; yellow background with black letters
requirements.flag_regulations: Red flags at extremities for oversize loads
requirements.warning_light_regulations: Amber warning lights required on escort vehicles
requirements.permit_dimensions: Routine max: 120'L x 18'W x 16'H; >16'W or >200,000 lbs requires special coordination
requirements.annual_permit_cost: $100 for ocean-borne containerized cargo annual permit
requirements.commodity_specific: Port cargo has special annual permits; agricultural equipment limited exemptions
requirements.route_requirements: Route approval required; public utility, NJDOT, county and municipal notification for >14'H

permit_costs.notes: Varies by dimensions and weight; annual limited to 14'W x 14.5'H x 140,000 lbs

requirements.minimum_road_width: Road width must accommodate load + 2 ft clearance each side
requirements.pilot_car_escort: 1 escort for >12' wide; 2 escorts for >14' wide OR >150' long
requirements.trip_permits: Available online through ODOT system; 2-day pre-approval for >90,000 lbs
requirements.running_hours: Daylight hours for OS loads; 1/2 hour before sunrise to 1/2 hour after sunset
requirements.holiday_restrictions: No travel on major holidays for oversize loads
requirements.banner_regulations: "OVERSIZE LOAD" banner required; yellow background with black letters
requirements.flag_regulations: Red or orange flags 18" square at extremities
requirements.warning_light_regulations: Amber flashing lights required on escort vehicles and wide loads
requirements.permit_dimensions: Standard max (without pre-approval): 112'L x 14'W x 14.5'H x 90,000 lbs; Annual max: 140,000 lbs; Superload >18'W or >160'L or >120,000 lbs
requirements.commodity_specific: Agricultural equipment may have exemptions; special provisions for construction equipment
requirements.route_requirements: Pre-approval required for >90,000 lbs; bridge analysis required; superloads require extensive planning

requirements.minimum_road_width: Road width must accommodate load + safe clearance
requirements.pilot_car_escort: 1 escort for >12' wide; 2 escorts for >14' wide OR >150' long
requirements.trip_permits: Available online through UDOT system; 14 days processing for >17.5'H or >17'W or >300,000 lbs
requirements.running_hours: Daylight hours for OS loads; some routes have specific restrictions
requirements.holiday_restrictions: No travel on major holidays for oversize loads
requirements.banner_regulations: "OVERSIZE LOAD" banner required; yellow background with black letters
requirements.flag_regulations: Red or orange flags at extremities for oversize loads
requirements.warning_light_regulations: Amber warning lights required on escort vehicles and wide loads
requirements.permit_dimensions: Standard max: 17'W x 17.5'H; Single-trip only for >125,000 lbs GVW

requirements.route_requirements: Route approval required for wide/heavy loads; bridge validation required; extensive coordination for superloads
